comments.author: David Smiley
comments.content: +1 to that sentiment!  I appreciate the cleanup you do in general Christine – just go and do it   Personally I feel the same way about other minor things – indentation/spacing, code wrapping, typos in comments or var names, re-ordering members (for readability/consistency).
